title: Part One: The Worst Police Union In History
itunes:title: Part One: The Worst Police Union In History
description:
Robert is joined by Tuck Woodstock to discuss the worst Police Department in the Country.

  1. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/06/10/police-unions-violence-research-george-floyd/ 
  2. https://www.amazon.com/Pickets-Pistols-Politics-Portland-Association/dp/B0043SVC3E
  3. https://pdxscholar.library.pdx.edu/open_access_etds/4434/
  4. https://college.lclark.edu/programs/political_economy/student_resources/past/
  5. https://www.newyorker.com/news/news-desk/how-police-union-power-helped-increase-abuses
